mains.name: Banku and Tilapia
mains.description: Mouthen mix of fermented corn and cassava dough, and a very hot pepper,diced tomatoes and onions.

mains.name: Waakye
mains.description: Medley of beans and rice serve with fried plantain, garri and spaghetti.

mains.name: Creamy Sage
mains.description: Chicken breast sautéed with fresh sage and prosciutto. Served atop creamy asiago linguini.

mains.name: Fufu and Goat light soup
mains.description: It is made by pounding yam and cassava in a soft sticky paste that go along with aromatic and spicy tomatoes soup.

mains.name: Jollof rice
mains.description: jollof rice serve with meat or fish.

mains.name: Chicken Marsala
mains.description: Boneless chicken breast sautéed with mushrooms and finished in a marsala and cream reduction.
